title: New Gloworm G2.0 night lights let you customize output via app, up to 3600 lumens!
content:
Gloworms’ night riding lights are among our favorites for their long run times, customizable beam patterns, and light weight. Now, their remote control options get better, with a new Bluetooth remote switch for your handlebar, and an app to customize each setting. The Gloworm G2.0 range also gets minor updates to the optics and tech […]
